Root.Ain_AlarmsMethod:
if pMe.Item(tagname & "_AlarmHH").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../AinData/" & tagname & "/#vars/HH_ALAck").Value = false end if
if pMe.Item(tagname & "_AlarmH").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../AinData/" & tagname & "/#vars/H_ALAck").Value = false end if if pMe.Item(tagname & "_AlarmL").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../AinData/" & tagname & "/#vars/L_ALAck").Value = false end if
if pMe.Item(tagname & "_AlarmLL").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../AinData/" & tagname & "/#vars/LL_ALAck").Value = false end if
if pMe.Item(tagname & "_HWSigFault").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../AinData/" & tagname & "/#vars/HWSigFault_ALAck").Value = false end if
Root.AnalogPos_AlarmsMethod:
if pMe.Item(tagname & "_FBFault").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../AnalogPosCtrlData/" & tagname & "/#vars/FBFault_ALAck").Value = false end if
if pMe.Item(tagname & "_PosError").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../AnalogPosCtrlData/" & tagname & "/#vars/PosError_ALAck").Value = false end if
if pMe.Item(tagname & "_HWSigFault_FB").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../AnalogPosCtrlData/" & tagname & "/#vars/HWSigFault_FB_ALAck").Value = false end if
Root.Aout_AlarmsMethod: if pMe.Item(tagname & "_HWSigFault").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../AoutData/" & tagname & "/#vars/HWSigFault_ALAck").Value = false end if
Root.Din_AlarmsMethod: if pMe.Item(tagname & "_Alarm").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../DinData/" & tagname & "/#vars/ALAck").Value = false end if
Root.OnOffCtrl_AlarmsMethod: if pMe.Item(tagname & "_FBFault").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../OnOffCtrlData/" & tagname & "/#vars/ALAck").Value = false end if
Root.OnOffCtrl2D_AlarmsMethod: if pMe.Item(tagname & "_FBFaultCW").Acknowledged and pMe.Item(tagname & "_FBFaultCCW").Acknowledged and pMe.Item(tagname & "_FBFaultStop").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../OnOffCtrlData_2D/" & tagname & "/#vars/ALAck").Value = false end if
Root.OnOffCtrlVSD_AlarmsMethod: if pMe.Item(tagname & "_FBFaultCW").Acknowledged and pMe.Item(tagname & "_FBFaultCCW").Acknowledged and pMe.Item(tagname & "_DriveFault").Acknowledged then pMe.Pm("../OnOffCtrlData_VSD/" & tagname & "/#vars/ALAck").Value = false end if
